#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);    
while(t--)
{
          long long int pi;
          int yi;
scanf("%lld%d",&pi,&yi);          
      while(yi!=2000)
      {
      pi=(pi*pi);
      pi=pi%1000000007;
      yi--;               
      }    
      printf("%lld\n",pi);
      }
//system("pause");
return 0;    
}
